articles.title: When Do New ‘Shogun’ Episodes Drop? Here’s The Full Release Schedule - Forbes
articles.description: FX’s historical drama “Shōgun” is the series to watch. With a 100% critics score on Rotten Tomatoes, learn when new episodes of the show will come out on FX and Hulu.
